COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146
STRING: Thinking about Lise...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152
STRING: And thinking about Arie, that's all I did that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168
STRING: I'd have an ensemble with Phorni at night anyway, so I
didn't even think of touching the Fortelle; instead I
stayed in bed with my books and stuff.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188
STRING: This was how I usually spent my days off, so I didn't feel
any dissatisfaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e
STRING: But while I was okay with that...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa
STRING: Phorni seemed dissatisfied with something, ever since
yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: [Phorni] “Hello, it's already noon? What about Fortelle
practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0
STRING: Ever since I'd had that honest talk with her yesterday,
she'd been like this the whole time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206
STRING: [Chris] “I'll do that at night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm not talking about ensembles. You must
have something to practice, for the graduation recital
and whatnot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, are you upset about something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a
STRING: [Phorni] “...No, I'm not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0
STRING: [Chris] “But?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2
STRING: [Phorni] “You haven't found a partner yet, but all you
think about is this other girl.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f2
STRING: [Chris] “...I told you, it's not like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310
STRING: [Phorni] “But it totally is like that, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x326
STRING: [Chris] “But I can't just leave her alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x358
STRING: [Phorni] “That may be so, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e
STRING: [Chris] “And, I just might ask her to be my partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: [Phorni] “Would she say yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Chris] “...Who knows.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8
STRING: [Phorni] “And that's why I said it wouldn't work, didn't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fe
STRING: [Chris] “Lise is... She's a lot like Arietta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x428
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43e
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, if I can't find someone, Ms. Cordell said
she'll figure something out for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47a
STRING: [Phorni] “So in the end, you're just relying on someone
else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: [Chris] “Only when I have no other choice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: There were some problems which couldn't be solved by
yourself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d0
STRING: Arietta... She probably discovered what she really liked
to do because Torta and I had been around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e8
STRING: If she had been alone at that time...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f6
STRING: That was a pointless question, of course, and not one
that could be answered meaningfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50c
STRING: But the fact was that Lise didn't have anyone she could
call a friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x522
STRING: At least, I didn't think Fal was a friend of hers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52e
STRING: And I wasn't one yet, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53a
STRING: But I wanted to be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x546
STRING: Lise was always running off to the Old Wing and singing
by herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: Right now, all I could do was perform ensembles with
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x572
STRING: But I wanted to keep going to the Old Wing, until I
became someone she could open up to and ask for
help.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ca
STRING: [Phorni] “...Well, whatever. You'll get to practice during
the ensembles tonight. I'll let you off the hook.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: [Chris] “Great, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: Phorni sounded as if she really meant it, and then she
laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x624
STRING: Relieved, I was about to get back into bed when...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: There was a knock on the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x664
STRING: [Chris] “...Who could this be?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: Even if I asked Phorni I wasn't going to get an answer,
so I rushed to the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x690
STRING: [Chris] “Okay! I'm opening the door!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6da
STRING: [Asino] “Yo, are you free now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f0
STRING: [Chris] “Well, you can see for yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70e
STRING: [Asino] “Wanna go out for a bit? There's something I
want to talk about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x724
STRING: [Chris] “Talk? ...Sure, but where?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x742
STRING: [Asino] “I was thinking of eating while we talked. How
about lunch?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x758
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't had any, so this could work out. Which
place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x776
STRING: [Asino] “How about that trattoria we went to last time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78c
STRING: I was just there yesterday, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x798
STRING: Well, it had a large menu, so I didn't mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ae
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. Just let me grab my coat, I won't be
long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d6
STRING: [Asino] “Make it snappy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ec
STRING: [Chris] “I'll be right out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x810
STRING: I left Asino at the door as I went inside to get my coat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: [Phorni] “Asino? Is it Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes, it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86c
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you heading out right now? I'll go take a
look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x898
STRING: Phorni dived down from the desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a4
STRING: I was a little worried as I watched her, but she
somehow made it safely to the front door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ba
STRING: I only had to put on my coat and tell Phorni I was going
out, so I was back with Asino in no time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x902
STRING: [Asino] “No problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, so this is Asino...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94a
STRING: Phorni looked up at him as she said that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: I couldn't respond, so I just nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x962
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x994
STRING: [Phorni] “Have a nice day...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: Asino looked at me as if I was crazy for talking to an
empty room, and responded in a small voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: [Chris] “It's a habit. Don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa16
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, what did you want to talk about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa50
STRING: [Asino] “It can wait, let's get there first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8a
STRING: Despite my answer, I did mind a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: Asino had come by my room several times before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaac
STRING: But he had never been inside before, so Phorni had
never seen his face until today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac2
STRING: I didn't think Asino would come by without some
significant reason, and his face did look a bit serious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: The trattoria was a mere five minutes' walk away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb14
STRING: We arrived at our destination shortly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb38
STRING: We placed our orders, then I drank a mouthful of water
before asking Asino again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4e
STRING: [Chris] “Well? Is it about your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb64
STRING: Right now, that was the only topic I could think of that
Asino and I would be talking about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: Asino probably didn't want to recall the lecture that
Grave gave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb90
STRING: Since that day, we hadn't said a word about it to each
other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb8
STRING: [Asino] “There's that too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbce
STRING: [Chris] “That's a little cryptic...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbec
STRING: [Asino] “Whatever. Actually, it's about Liselsia.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: [Chris] “...Liselsia? Are you talking about Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc34
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah. That first-year student we met in front of
the bulletin board.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc54
STRING: [Chris] “So her name is Liselsia, that's pretty. But why are
you mentioning her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: [Asino] “...I got a little concerned, so I asked around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca6
STRING: [Chris] “Concerned? Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc4
STRING: [Asino] “She mentioned Grave's lecture, right? That got
me thinking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: [Chris] “...Is that so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd16
STRING: [Asino] “Anyway, you should probably give up on her,
don't you think?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd36
STRING: [Chris] “...What do you mean? I'm not...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd68
STRING: [Asino] “You haven't practiced with anyone lately, right?
Besides, it's not like you know that many people. Simple
process of elimination.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd92
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, but... How did you know about my
practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdba
STRING: [Asino] “Tortinita complained about it to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd0
STRING: [Chris] “...I see. I didn't realize you two were that close.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: [Asino] “Stop it. It's not like I asked for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe18
STRING: [Chris] “Torta said that as well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4a
STRING: [Asino] “I know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: So, do you intend to pair up with her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe84
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes, for now. But you think I shouldn't?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb6
STRING: [Asino] “There are some nasty rumors, that's why.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: [Chris] “What...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeea
STRING: [Asino] “I mean, considering who her father is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf00
STRING: Wait a minute, is what I was going to say...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: [Asino] “Huh? What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3e
STRING: [Chris] “...Why is Lise's father coming up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf70
STRING: [Asino] “Ah, I was going to tell you that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9e
STRING: It's Grave.
Grave Cesarini.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb4
STRING: Just then, the waiter brought us our food.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc0
STRING: I sat back down and drank a mouthful of water to calm
myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd6
STRING: Asino moved his plate to one side, I guess he wasn't
going to start until he finished talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: I wasn't much in the mood for having a peaceful meal
either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: Asino was waiting for the right time to resume our
conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100e
STRING: It was completely irrelevant to my situation now, right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: Or maybe it wasn't...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102e
STRING: [Asino] “Just as you would expect from Grave's
daughter, she apparently does terrible things behind the
scenes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1064
STRING: I wanted Lise herself to tell me about her identity, and
about those rumors.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107a
STRING: But perhaps... It might be better not to know?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1086
STRING: Maybe this misunderstanding could've been resolved
right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109c
STRING: With that thought, I couldn't stop Asino from talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: [Asino] “Abusing her father's position to squeeze into
competitions that are already full, for example, or
pairing with a professional singer in an official
competition.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: [Asino] “They say she's secretly proud of doing things
like that, and that she's arrogant and insufferable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: [Chris] “...That's enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112a
STRING: [Asino] “There's one more thing I have to say to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Chris] “I'll pass. Besides, I don't believe in such rumors.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115e
STRING: [Asino] “No, you should hear this one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: [Chris] “...Shut up, Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1192
STRING: [Asino] “No, you shut up, and listen. Pairing up with a
professional singer... Doesn't that strike you as odd?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11bc
STRING: [Chris] “With another singer? It's normal to have such
duos, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f8
STRING: [Asino] “Pairing up with a professional singer doesn't
really do much good for a voice student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: In fact,
it only makes the lack of experience more obvious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1246
STRING: [Chris] “...So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1264
STRING: [Asino] “But when paired with a Fortelle, a professional
singer can really help a student shine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1284
STRING: [Chris] “But you said just now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a2
STRING: [Asino] “Liselsia Cesarini, first-year Fortelle student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12da
STRING: I told
you she was Grave's daughter, didn't I? Did you think
he would let her be anything other than a Fortelle
player?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f0
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise is a Fortelle student?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1322
STRING: [Asino] “Yes, I confirmed it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: I'll bet you won't hear that
from her. Who knows, she might be making fun of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1366
STRING: [Chris] “...No, that's not true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1384
STRING: [Asino] “Can you be absolutely sure?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139a
STRING: [Chris] “I just said so, didn't you hear me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13cc
STRING: [Asino] “...Hmph.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e2
STRING: With that, Asino's expression relaxed, and he gave his
usual sardonic smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: [Asino] “I thought you'd say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1416
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1434
STRING: [Asino] “All that was what I've heard. Now let me tell
you what I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1454
STRING: [Chris] “...Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: [Asino] “Rumors are rumors.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b4
STRING: I've only met her once, so I
can't judge.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: [Chris] “What were your impressions? I don't think she
came across that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f2
STRING: [Asino] “Well, I've also heard that when things don't
work out for her, she'll cry and fish for sympathy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152a
STRING: Don't get mad, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1540
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not mad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1572
STRING: [Asino] “Anyway, you're closer to Liselsia, so you can be
the better judge. I won't say anything else. But just bear
in mind what I've told you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159c
STRING: [Chris] “...I appreciate it, in a way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ba
STRING: [Asino] “Sure. So what are you going to do about your
partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d0
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? I was thinking of asking Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1602
STRING: [Asino] “Really? She's not in the vocal course, you
realize?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1618
STRING: [Chris] “In principle, we can partner up with anyone,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164a
STRING: [Asino] “...Yes, in principle. Is she good at singing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1660
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. After a few ensembles, I think she's got a
good voice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1680
STRING: Furthermore, as a Fortelle student, she must've had
almost no formal vocal training.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1696
STRING: That meant she had acquired her technique through
self-study.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ac
STRING: It was safe to assume that she had natural talent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c0
STRING: [Asino] “Well, I have no objections to you pairing up
with Liselsia. Just do as you please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e0
STRING: [Chris] “...Anyway, the problem is whether she'll agree
to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1700
STRING: All jokes aside, that was the most pressing issue at
hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170c
STRING: The rumors were all lies... probably.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: [Asino] “You really are an oddball, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174a
STRING: [Chris] “...Even so, those rumors just now, it's not as if
she was responsible for them, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: [Asino] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179c
STRING: [Chris] “You talked about her abusing her father's
position, but I don't think Lise would ask for such things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17bc
STRING: [Chris] “On the other hand, that Grave would, wouldn't
he? Getting a professional singer, for instance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17dc
STRING: Mimicking Asino, I emphasized the “that” in “that Grave.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180e
STRING: [Asino] “Well, it's possible that she's covering it all up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: [Chris] “If she were covering it up, then why would she
be insufferable?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1842
STRING: [Asino] “Perhaps she only told a close friend about it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1858
STRING: [Chris] “And where is this close friend?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188a
STRING: [Asino] “Maybe that destroyed the friendship.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a0
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b6
STRING: It was a possibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c2
STRING: But I didn't believe it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ce
STRING: Someone abusing her father's position wouldn't be
hiding in the Old Wing to sing, surely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e4
STRING: Such a position could definitely be used more
effectively.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18fa
STRING: That was how I could be absolutely sure, just as Asino
had said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1906
STRING: And if I was really being deceived, then I just had to
admit defeat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191c
STRING: It wasn't what Fal had said yesterday, but if you trusted
someone too much, then you only had yourself to
blame.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1932
STRING: ...Though I didn't think for one second that it was
possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1964
STRING: [Asino] “...Anyway, you can judge for yourself. Let's eat
before our food gets cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1984
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a8
STRING: I had almost forgotten about our meal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b4
STRING: I moved my plate back in front of me and ate my cooled
main dish in a hurry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a16
STRING: [Asino] “Well, that's all I had to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2c
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. I guess you came to encourage me,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a5e
STRING: [Asino] “Fat chance. I came to laugh at you for being
duped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a74
STRING: [Chris] “No one's duping me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa6
STRING: [Asino] “I certainly hope not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1abc
STRING: [Chris] “...You know about Lise, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aee
STRING: [Asino] “I don't. I've barely spoken to her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2c
STRING: [Asino] “Anyway, about Liselsia, keep trying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b42
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5c
STRING: With that, Asino went home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b68
STRING: If he really believed that I was being deceived, he
wouldn't have said that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7e
STRING: Of course, if I'd said that, Asino would've countered by
saying that he meant for me to keep trying not to get
deceived.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b94
STRING: But regardless of what he said, Asino was looking out
for me as a friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1baa
STRING: Torta would probably disagree, but his finding out all
that information about Lise today was probably for my
sake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bca
STRING: His dislike for Grave was probably genuine though.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c12
STRING: I returned to my room and got into bed once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c1e
STRING: I had a lot of things to think about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2a
STRING: First, the fact that Lise was in the Fortelle course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c36
STRING: As I told Asino, I wasn't that concerned about this point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4c
STRING: There was no problem with her abilities.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5a
STRING: But there seemed to be a problem within Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c66
STRING: Even though she was a Fortelle student, she liked
singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7c
STRING: It seemed she was trying to hide that fact, by singing
alone in the Old Wing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c92
STRING: And considering Grave's personality, he probably
wouldn't allow it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca8
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb6
STRING: Anyone who heard her sing was bound to change their
mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ccc
STRING: That was the only thing I knew for certain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd8
STRING: But I couldn't even give her the chance to do that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce4
STRING: Seeing how everyone avoided her at the Cenacolo, I
doubted anyone would be willing to listen to her sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cfc
STRING: That was precisely why the graduation recital was such
a good opportunity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d48
STRING: [Phorni] “...You look really serious, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5e
STRING: [Chris] “...Hmm? That's because I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d74
STRING: Phorni hadn't been around when I got back, but now
she suddenly appeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8a
STRING: She stared down at me from the desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d96
STRING: Still in bed, I sat up to listen to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dbe
STRING: [Phorni] “You should've said something when you came
in, at least.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dec
STRING: So? What did Asino have to say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e02
STRING: [Chris] “...He was very encouraging. About Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e18
STRING: It was an overstatement, but not entirely wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2e
STRING: That was just Asino's way of speaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e56
STRING: [Phorni] “Give me the details.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e84
STRING: That wasn't all he said,
was it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e90
STRING: [Chris] “Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea6
STRING: I didn't know if my expression had given her the idea,
but Phorni had sensed something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ebc
STRING: There was an odd certainty in her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec8
STRING: And so I told Phorni everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed4
STRING: Phorni wouldn't mind, I could tell her anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee0
STRING: In fact, I should probably let her hear Lise sing, at least
once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eec
STRING: I wouldn't be able to convey Phorni's opinion to Lise, but
I wanted to know what she thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f02
STRING: [Chris] “...That's what he said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2c
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f42
STRING: [Chris] “And that's why I'm thinking of asking Lise to be
my partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f60
STRING: [Phorni] “If you think that's a good idea, Chris, then
that's good enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f80
STRING: This was different from the grudging approval of this
morning; Phorni actually sounded serious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f96
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. I have no idea how things will turn out
yet, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc8
STRING: [Phorni] “But you're going to tell Torta about it, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fde
STRING: [Chris] “...Why is Torta's name coming up now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2010
STRING: [Phorni] “Because, I'm sure she's worried about you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2026
STRING: [Chris] “I-I guess that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204a
STRING: That was all I said as I lay down once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2056
STRING: I couldn't prioritize thinking about Arie or Torta right
now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206c
STRING: Of course, I couldn't abandon Arietta altogether.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2078
STRING: I was going to write back to Arie when her letter came
today, my feelings for her wouldn't change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208e
STRING: But I didn't want to be the kind of heartless person who
would abandon a friend in need, even if our only
interaction so far had been ensembles.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ae
STRING: My feelings for Lise were entirely different from those I
had for Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ba
STRING: So for now and just for now, I silently asked for Arie's
forgiveness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: Dear Chris. I wonder, is it raining there now as you read
this letter?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2156
STRING: The weather here is lovely, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216c
STRING: Is it about time for you to choose your partner for your
graduation recital?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218a
STRING: In your last letter, you mentioned that it might not be
Torta, but do you have anyone else?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a8
STRING: I guess I'm a little worried, because I know you're not so
good at making new friends.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c6
STRING: I think I wrote the exact same thing when you first
enrolled, but you ended up making great friends, like
Asino, didn't you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e6
STRING: So, I suppose I'm not so worried about whether or not
you can make friends...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2204
STRING: It's something else that I'm worried about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2218
STRING: Where I am now, and where you are now are so far
apart, so I can only know the things that Torta tells me,
right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2240
STRING: That's why I've started to feel a little concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2254
STRING: I heard that one of your possible partners is a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2268
STRING: And that she's pretty, and a lovely person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x227c
STRING: I know that in terms of percentages it's fifty-fifty, so I'm
not trying to blame you because it's a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x229a
STRING: But you know, I just can't help but be concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ae
STRING: I know it sounds like I'm complaining, but you'll forgive
me, won't you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22cc
STRING: There's one more thing. I have unfortunate news.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e2
STRING: I'm not sure I'll be able to visit you this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f6
STRING: Just like it has been three years since you started your
student life, it's also been three years since I started
working here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2314
STRING: I've put a lot of time and effort into my work, and I also
happen to like doing it, so I'm happy to report that I've
recently been given more responsibilities, including the
training of new staff.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x233c
STRING: I'm going to be particularly busy at the end of the year,
so it doesn't seem like I'll be able to get away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x235a
STRING: It's such a shame I won't be able to see you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2370
STRING: But I'm sure you're going to be busy with your
graduation recital practice, so I'll just be patient.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238e
STRING: But thinking about that now... I won't have to be patient
for much longer, will I?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ac
STRING: I really can't wait for that day to come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c0
STRING: Take care, I'll write again soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d4
STRING: P.S.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ea
STRING: Regardless of who you choose as your partner, just
make sure to tell Torta first, okay?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2408
STRING: She's always worried about you and how you're doing,
you know?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x241c
STRING: I asked her to look out for you, since I can't be there to
do it myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2444
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247a
STRING: I needed slightly more time than usual to rouse myself
from the feeling Arie's letter had left me with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2490
STRING: I was definitely leaning toward Lise as my choice of
partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a6
STRING: But I was still uncertain if I should mention that to Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24b2
STRING: There was the possibility of rejection, and more
importantly, once the topic of Lise was brought up, a lot
of other things would have to be mentioned too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f8
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250e
STRING: [Chris] “...Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252c
STRING: [Phorni] “What did Arie say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2542
STRING: [Chris] “Just the same as usual.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2558
STRING: I traced the surface of the carefully folded letter, and
whispered the words once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256e
STRING: [Chris] “The same as usual.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2584
STRING: For some reason I was unable to start writing my
response immediately, and I just sat at my desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x259a
STRING: Supposing that I followed the excuse I had been telling
my heart, and I chose not to partner up with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25b0
STRING: Would that result not end up being a betrayal of both
Arie and Torta?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c6
STRING: A vague sense of unease gripped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ee
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2604
STRING: Phorni was standing on top of my music stand,
beckoning to me with her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2622
STRING: [Phorni] “Let's play something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2638
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267e
STRING: When I was surrounded by music, I was free from all
manner of restraints.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2694
STRING: I felt the pleasant sound of her voice on my skin, and I
let myself be taken over by the sensation of the waves
gently rocking me to my core.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ac
STRING: I wasn't sure how many songs we played in succession.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ba
STRING: But we clearly played more songs than we usually ever
did, because it was already time for bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26d2
STRING: Before I could revel in the satisfaction of our session, I
rushed to the window and looked outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fe
STRING: It was dark, and I realized that it had become quite late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2714
STRING: I hurriedly prepared to write my reply to Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274c
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh my, it's gotten pretty late, hasn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2762
STRING: [Chris] “It sure has. I'd better finish this letter, fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2780
STRING: [Phorni] “Otherwise you won't have it ready by
tomorrow morning, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2796
STRING: Phorni moved her face closer to get a look at what I
was writing, which was unusual for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ac
STRING: [Chris] “Didn't I tell you a long time ago not to look?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27de
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, c'mon! I wanna see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f4
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not going to write anything particularly
special.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2826
STRING: [Phorni] “What about your prospective partner? She
asked you, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x283c
STRING: [Chris] “Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286e
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you going to write about Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2884
STRING: [Chris] “...I won't tell her the details yet. I'll just say that
I'm practicing with a female first-year student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ac
STRING: [Phorni] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28cc
STRING: Phorni spoke in a whisper, then vanished into thin air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e2
STRING: I placed the finished letter in my bag and returned to
my bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x290a
STRING: I'd lost track of how many times I'd been in bed like this
today, but I must've been tired, because I fell asleep
almost instantly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2980
STRING: Dear Chris. I wonder, is it raining there now as you read
this letter?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x299e
STRING: The weather here is lovely, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29b4
STRING: Is it about time for you to choose your partner for your
graduation recital?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29d2
STRING: In your last letter, you mentioned that it might not be
Torta, but do you have anyone else?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29f0
STRING: I guess I'm a little worried, because I know you're not so
good at making new friends.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0e
STRING: I think I wrote the exact same thing when you first
enrolled, but you ended up making great friends, like
Asino, didn't you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a2e
STRING: So, I suppose I'm not so worried about whether or not
you can make friends...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4c
STRING: It's something else that I'm worried about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a60
STRING: Where I am now, and where you are now are so far
apart, so I can only know the things that Torta tells me,
right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a88
STRING: That's why I've started to feel a little concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a9c
STRING: I heard that one of your possible partners is a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab0
STRING: And that she's pretty, and a lovely person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac4
STRING: I know that in terms of percentages it's fifty-fifty, so I'm
not trying to blame you because it's a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae2
STRING: But you know, I just can't help but be concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2af6
STRING: I know it sounds like I'm complaining, but you'll forgive
me, won't you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b14
STRING: There's one more thing. I have unfortunate news.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2a
STRING: I'm not sure I'll be able to visit you this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b3e
STRING: Just like it has been three years since you started your
student life, it's also been three years since I started
working here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b5c
STRING: I've put a lot of time and effort into my work, and I also
happen to like doing it, so I'm happy to report that I've
recently been given more responsibilities, including the
training of new staff.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b84
STRING: I'm going to be particularly busy at the end of the year,
so it doesn't seem like I'll be able to get away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba2
STRING: It's such a shame I won't be able to see you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bb8
STRING: But I'm sure you're going to be busy with your
graduation recital practice, so I'll just be patient.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bd6
STRING: But thinking about that now... I won't have to be patient
for much longer, will I?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bf4
STRING: I really can't wait for that day to come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c08
STRING: Take care, I'll write again soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c1c
STRING: P.S.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c32
STRING: Regardless of who you choose as your partner, just
make sure to tell Torta first, okay?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c50
STRING: She's always worried about you and how you're doing,
you know?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c64
STRING: I asked her to look out for you, since I can't be there to
do it myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8c
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cc2
STRING: I needed slightly more time than usual to rouse myself
from the feeling Arie's letter had left me with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cd8
STRING: I was back to square one regarding my recital partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cee
STRING: I'd decided yesterday to forget all about Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cfa
STRING: I spent the whole day performing ensembles with
Phorni, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d06
STRING: My Natale this year was going to be a little lonely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d12
STRING: It was a shame, but there was nothing I could do about
Arie's situation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d1e
STRING: I summed that up in a short letter, which I put inside my
bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2a
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, who's up for an ensemble?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d76
STRING: [Phorni] “...Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d8c
STRING: I'd told Phorni all about Lise too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d98
STRING: Her only response then was a short “I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc0
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, today let's play until the stars come
out...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd6
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e18
STRING: Our ensembles went on till late that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e24
STRING: It would take some more time for me to forget about
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e30
STRING: But all I needed to do was think about Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e3c
STRING: That way, time would pass really quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e48
STRING: Just like the two years which had already gone by.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e54
STRING: The next three months would pass in the blink of an
eye.
